16586.quoteText: We may use this profile or fingerprint to understand and analyze how you interact with the Services, to customize content or advertising to you through the Services, to monitor against fraud or misuse of the Services, or in other ways consistent with this Privacy Policy.

16587.quoteText: We and our service providers may automatically collect location information, including general information (e.g., IP address, zip code) from your computer or mobile device. The Services use this location information to provide customized location-based services, content, promotional offers and other information that may be of interest to you.

16588.quoteText: Targeting cookies. These cookies record your visit to our website, the pages you have visited and the links you have followed.
